title: Log a Lost Item
description: A guest calls the day after a concert to report that they lost their wallet at the venue.

tasks.description: Get a detailed description of the lost wallet and its contents from the guest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all relevant details (color, brand, contents).

tasks.description: Search the lost and found database for any matching items that were turned in.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent searches the database but finds no matching wallet.

tasks.description: Create a new lost item report in the database with the guest's description and contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new report so they can be contacted if the wallet is found.
